name: "Finite Formalised Natural Language"
short_description:
"Finite Formalized Natural Language" project's goal is to create a performant and sound handling API for working with data expressed using formal finite subset of languages which are collectively described by a term "natural language".

Note: Among other things, this API may or may not include handling of discourse parts expressed using miscelanneous formal grammars, including formal grammars of programming languages.

Project status: Inception; a working code is neither  uploaded to project's files, nor uploaded to project's SVN; no working code had been written at the time of writing this description.

If you're interested, please write at a forum or write an e-mail to me (Evgeniy Philippov <buguldey.aicommunity@gmail.com>).

For a discussion about this project, see http://ailab.ru/forum/obshenie/misli-vslukh/o-konechnikh-formalizovannikh-predstavleniyakh-podmnojestv-eya.html (in Russian).
summary: A project codenamed "Finite Formalized Natural Language"
